div.h1: Nara Institute of Science and Technology
div.p: NAIST served as the hub of Ku-band links of AI3 network test-bed from 1996 to 2004. This earth station connected ITB, AIT, and HKUST.

AI3 operations in Ku-band proved that Internet connections using Ku-band, which is highly affected by rain, in tropical areas worked by adding more rainfall signal margin to the link configurations. However, sometimes the links were briefly disconnected during torrential rain.
